item.title: Matrixport multiple associated addresses deposit 95,873 ETH to CEX, worth over $450 million
item.description: On August 23, according to the monitoring of lookonchain, in the past 3 hours, multiple wallets related to Matrixport have transferred 95,873 ETH (equivalent to 4.52 billion USD) into Binance and OKX.

item.title: WLFI Pre-market Contract Surges Above $0.4, Up Over 7% in Half an Hour
item.description: On August 23rd, based on market data, the WLFI pre-market contract price experienced a rebound and broke through $0.4, witnessing a more than 7% increase within half an hour.

item.title: A whale is currently closing its long position on XPL while shorting WLFI, still holding long positions in ETH and SOL worth over $50 million.
item.description: On August 23rd, according to MLM data, a new wallet that deposited $12 million into Hyperliquid two days ago is currently liquidating its $3 million XPL long position at TWAP (Time Weighted Average Price) and simultaneously shorting $1.5 million worth of WLFI.This liquidation operation has caused the XPL funding rate to drop to -0.0040% (annualized -35%). Additionally, the wallet also holds $40 million in long positions of ETH and $11 million in long positions of SOL.

item.title: Ethereum Withdrawal Recovery, 24-hour CEX Net Outflow of 23,400 ETH
item.description: On August 23rd, based on Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, CEX had a total net outflow of 23,400 ETH. The top three CEX outflows are as follows:· Binance, with an outflow of 43,800 ETH;· OKX, with an outflow of 10,500 ETH;· Bybit, with an outflow of 8,596.86 ETH.In addition, Kraken witnessed an inflow of 35,300 ETH and ranked first on the inflow list.

item.title: If Ethereum drops below $4600, the total long liquidation on major CEXs will reach $2.401 billion.
item.description: On August 23rd, according to Coinglass data, if Ethereum drops below $4600, the cumulative liquidation intensity of mainstream CEXs in terms of long positions will reach $2.401 billion.Conversely, if Ethereum rises above $4900, the cumulative liquidation intensity of mainstream CEXs in terms of short positions will reach $1.540 billion.BlockBeats Note: The liquidation chart does not accurately show the number of contracts awaiting liquidation or the exact value of contracts being liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to adjacent liquidation clusters, that is, intensity. Therefore, the liquidation chart shows to what extent the underlying price will be influenced when it reaches a certain level. Higher "liquidation bars" indicate that when the price reaches that level, it will experience a more intense reaction due to a liquidity avalanche.

item.title: A whale deposited 77,736 ETH into Bitfinex, enjoying a 31x unrealized gain
item.description: On August 23rd, as monitored by EmberCN, 77,736 ETH (valued at $368 million) was transferred from address 0xfDFE to Bitfinex 10 minutes ago. This 77,736 ETH was originally withdrawn from Bitfinex 6 and a half years ago (in 2019/1), and at that time, it was only worth $11.9 million.In February of this year, this fund was transferred to Bitfinex and then withdrawn back onto the blockchain. Currently, all of these ETH have been transferred to Bitfinex again. The value has increased from $11.9 million 7 years ago to $368 million, representing a 31-fold increase.

item.title: WLFI has been listed on the Hyperliquid pre-sale contract.
item.description: On August 23rd, WLFI is now featured on the Hyperliquid pre-trading contract panel, and it has a placeholder price of $0.370.

item.title: Analysis: Based on WLFI at $0.36, a participation price of $0.015 would allow public sale participants to make a 4.8x profit at listing.
item.description: August 23rd. Based on the analysis of crypto KOL AB Kuai.Dong, when looking at WLFI's pre-market contract, it is currently trading in a sideways manner around $0.36, and the corresponding total market value is $36.4 billion. If, according to the official information, only 20% of the public offering investor shares are unlocked at the opening price of $0.36, the following can be anticipated:· For those who entered at $0.015, the opening will result in a profit of 4.8 times, with a total unrealized gain of 24 times.· For those who entered at $0.05, the opening will bring a profit of 1.44 times, with a total unrealized gain of 7.2 times.

item.title: Binance Alpha New Airdrop Threshold Announced: Minimum 200 Points
item.description: On August 23rd, Binance announced that users are advised to get prepared to claim the Binance Alpha Airdrop at 20:00 today. Users with at least 200 Binance Alpha points can claim the tokens on a first-come, first-served basis until the airdrop pool is completely distributed or the airdrop event ends. Further details will be made known shortly.

item.title: BiyaPay Analyst: Cryptocurrency Concept Stocks Drive US Stock IPO Revival, Expected to See a Wave of Listings in the Fall
item.description: On August 22nd, BiyaPay analysts projected that by the end of the year, dozens of companies might go public in the US, and the total fundraising amount could potentially exceed $15 billion. The US stock market data on the multi-asset trading platform BiyaPay indicates that after the successful listings of the stablecoin issuer Circle and the tech company Figma, the first-day stock price increments of both exceeded 100%, which further spurred more potential IPO companies to expedite their listing processes. Crypto companies like Gemini and Figure are actively accelerating their IPO applications.
